医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阿斯利康 (AstraZeneca) 获得 NICE 对肺癌治疗的积极建议阿斯利康本周宣布，已收到英国国家健康与护理卓越研究所 (NICE) 的两项关于治疗英格兰和威尔士肺癌患者的积极建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/AstraZeneca-receives-positive-NICE-recommendations-for-lung-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/AstraZeneca-receives-positive-NICE-recommendations-for-lung-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a543daa9-29bf-4347-8159-8193c852915f Sat, 25 Jan 2025 00:37:00 -0500 AstraZeneca receives positive NICE recommendations for lung cancer treatment
创新方法追踪血液中的 SARS-CoV-2 以指导 COVID-19 治疗麻省总医院布里格姆分校的研究人员发现，一种最初设计用于癌症检测的方法也可以识别和监测急性 COVID-19 感染患者的血液和其他体液中甚至微量的 SARS-CoV-2 完整病毒颗粒，从而为癌症检测创造了潜力。指导患者今后的治疗。该研究发表在《科学进展》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Innovative-approach-tracks-SARS-CoV-2-in-the-blood-to-guide-COVID-19-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250125/Innovative-approach-tracks-SARS-CoV-2-in-the-blood-to-guide-COVID-19-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39bfa765-73e5-4247-b263-84226a4f1c79 Sat, 25 Jan 2025 00:30:00 -0500 Innovative approach tracks SARS-CoV-2 in the blood to guide COVID-19 treatment
新候选药物显示出恢复多发性硬化症患者视力的潜力科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员发现了一种有前途的候选药物，可以帮助患有多发性硬化症 (MS) 和其他损害神经元的神经系统疾病的患者恢复视力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-drug-candidate-shows-potential-to-restore-vision-in-people-with-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-drug-candidate-shows-potential-to-restore-vision-in-people-with-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38931efb-7344-4a02-9b44-f892a48d4229 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:54:06 -0500 New drug candidate shows potential to restore vision in people with MS
大学医院为椎间盘突出的背痛患者引入内窥镜脊柱手术大学医院现在为因脊柱椎间盘突出而需要治疗背痛的患者提供内窥镜脊柱手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/University-Hospitals-introduces-endooscopy-spine-surgery-for-back-pain-病人-with-herniated-discs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/University-Hospitals-introduces-endooscopy-spine-surgery-for-back-pain-病人-with-herniated-discs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=316079bf-29ef-41d2-8e86-23d900888aab Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:49:00 -0500 University Hospitals introduces endoscopic spine surgery for back pain patients with herniated discs
研究发现免疫环境影响白血病免疫治疗的成功来自哥伦比亚工程学院和欧文癌症动力学研究所的研究小组在癌症免疫治疗领域取得了关键发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Immune-environment-found-to-influence-success-of-leukemia-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Immune-environment-found-to-influence-success-of-leukemia-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=942538ef-41ea-4bd8-b58f-7bb23455d05e Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:46:00 -0500 Immune environment found to influence success of leukemia immunotherapy
新方法使用肽来增强抗肿瘤药物配方一组科学家开发了一种突破性的方法，使用专门设计的肽来改进药物配方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-approach-uses-peptides-to-enhance-anti-tumor-drug-formulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/New-approach-uses-peptides-to-enhance-anti-tumor-drug-formulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1789bbf3-802c-4450-9a5e-58d7249ac493 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:37:00 -0500 New approach uses peptides to enhance anti-tumor drug formulations
UH Seidman 癌症中心推出先进的 Varian Ethos 2.0 用于癌症治疗UH Seidman 癌症中心的放射肿瘤学家为诊断患有多种癌症的患者提供了另一种强大的治疗选择，即 Varian Ethos 2.0，能够进行一种称为适应性放射治疗的新型放射治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/UH-Seidman-Cancer-Center-introduces-advanced-Varian-Ethos-20-for-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/UH-Seidman-Cancer-Center-introduces-advanced-Varian-Ethos-20-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d79c772a-c210-453d-a196-3084b50f050f Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:35:00 -0500 UH Seidman Cancer Center introduces advanced Varian Ethos 2.0 for cancer treatment
研究人员确定了 AML 患者成功输注供体淋巴细胞的关键因素丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员已经确定了决定供体淋巴细胞输注 (DLI) 是否能够成功使患者病情缓解的因素，DLI 是一种针对同种异体造血干细胞移植后复发的急性髓系白血病 (AML) 患者的标准疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Researchers-identify-key-factors-for-successful-donor-lymphocyte-infusion-in-AML-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Researchers-identify-key-factors-for-successful-donor-lymphocyte-infusion-in-AML-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11b2a248-b58a-4591-b258-203f7863ad5e Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:06:00 -0500 Researchers identify key factors for successful donor lymphocyte infusion in AML patients
研究凸显了早期前列腺癌基因组测试的潜力莫菲特癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新审查评估了三种基因组测试——Decipher、Oncotype DX 基因组前列腺评分 (GPS) 和 Prolaris——如何帮助医生就如何治疗早期前列腺癌患者做出更好的决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Study-highlights-pottial-of-genomic-tests-for-early-stage-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Study-highlights-pottial-of-genomic-tests-for-early-stage-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce70a004-475b-4900-b0ec-8507e424199b Fri, 24 Jan 2025 21:01:05 -0500 Study highlights potential of genomic tests for early stage prostate cancer
在线应用程序通过蛋白质和纤维跟踪支持减肥许多人都在努力保持健康的体重，而选择最佳的减肥膳食可能具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Online-app-supports-weight-loss-through- Protein-and-Fiber-tracking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250124/Online-app-supports-weight-loss-through- Protein-and-Fiber-tracking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=315f576e-97ec-4827-8d64-88daac959a57 Fri, 24 Jan 2025 20:56:41 -0500 Online app supports weight loss through protein and fiber tracking
